dublinCore.title: 113 HR 3226 IH: To remove from the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System certain properties in South Carolina.
dublinCore.rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Rice of South Carolina introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To remove from the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System certain properties in South Carolina.

section.header: Removal of properties in South Carolina from John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System

subsection.text: The Secretary of the Interior shall revise one or more maps included in the set of maps entitled Coastal Barrier Resources System referred to in section 4(a) of the Coastal Barrier Resources Act ( 16 U.S.C. 3503(a) ), and relating to John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Unit SC–01 in South Carolina, as necessary to remove from such System the following parcels of land adjacent to property located at 10108 Kings Road in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina:

paragraph.text: The parcel identified in the land records of Horry County, South Carolina, as TMS 155–00–01–115, consisting of approximately 6.94 acres.
The parcel identified in such land records as TMS 155–00–01–051, consisting of approximately 13.91 acres.

subsection.text: The Secretary of the Interior shall keep each map revised under subsection (a) on file and available for inspection in accordance with section 4(b) of the Coastal Barrier Resources Act ( 16 U.S.C. 3503(b) ).
